title: pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body:
i just got a new pc (windows 7) and i started to download LOL after doing it it pressed "Finish" and got the error "pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working" i went to riot support and done every thing but and send a ticket but i have no results help if you know how to fix it or had the same problme befor

for now i will not play LOL {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: This error is usually due to a setting in your OS that is blocking the patcher form loading and scanning files.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to allow the client access!  This should fix you up.  Grats on your new pc!
